# Newsletter - _Birding Brisbane_

Alongside the _Atlas_ project, a monthly newsletter has been launched. _Birding Brisbane_ is all about birds and birdwatching in the River City, and is written by Brisbane Birders, for Brisbane Birders. It may be downloaded from this page, or from the [Fuller Lab website](https://www.fullerlab.org/category/blog/). Please email [Richard Fuller](mailto:r.fuller@uq.edu.au) or [Louis Backstrom](mailto:louis.backstrom@gmail.com) with comments, story ideas, or even better â€“ draft material for the next issue!

Happy reading, and enjoy your birding!
